body:
Day 9 - Manga 116
I hate these type of things, why do one page or two of one thing and not a whole book. You want to do with all of them, then make multiple.
Nevertheless, the art wasn't that good so 3/10.
Just an art book pretty much 5/10
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse

Oi, Josuke! I used [Za Hando] to erase doujinshi 117 and now a mini green gundam is after me.
